entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Installing DotNet CLI via winget not working - Dotnet CLI missing #41878

Closed

  • dotnet download page unavailable #41875
  • msbuild can not generate Publish.html file #41881
  • Change wwwroot to Assets in Razor Class Library #41818
  • Portable RID PublishAOT doesn't work from source-build VMR .NET 9 Preview 5 #41727

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix 15 packages to track their own versions through darc #41890
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2486379 #41887
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41885
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use CPM in Binary Tool #41884
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • VMR: Update .gdnbaselines to address CredScan findings #41882
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Support for Android Fast Deployment Telemetry [WIP] #41880
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add feature switch for StackTraceSupport #41873

Merged

  • Reenable passed tests with skip attribute set as string #41753
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update CODEOWNERS to include ClickOnce contributors #41883
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refactor workload set and workload install/update logic #39991
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Prefer the portable ILCompiler when publishing for the portable RID on a source-built SDK. #41754
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Aspire 8.0 workload in the 9.0 SDK #41562
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • Update ILLink team name #41734
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #41695
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Configuration] #41694
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Unskip tests with Done issues + dotnet-format test fix #41684
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adjust SB license and content test triggers #41831
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Obtain internal runtime SAS tokens via federated creds #41797
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Set CI Job timeouts #41733
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add RazorLangVersion 9 #40348
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Plan for addressing torn SDK builds #41790
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview6] Allow runtime binary into the VMR #41839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41716
  • Update Documentation to fix issues when running `zsh` #41668
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
